defi-info-1: Two appointments per day are available for each time zone.
defi-info-2: Appointment time status: not started - the countdown to the time that can be reserved is about to end - indicating the countdown of the remaining time until the end of the appointment time.
defi-info-3: Appointment time for session 1: Appointment time: 08:00 - 12:00 AM, appointment result: 13:00 PM, trading time: 13:30 - 13:35 PM
defi-info-4: Reservation time for session 2: Reservation time: 17:00-21:00 PM, reservation result: 22:00 PM, trading time: 22:30-22:35 PM
defi-info-5: You can only participate in the appointment during the appointment time period, and you cannot make an appointment after the appointment time period.
defi-info-6: Available balance: the number of NFTs listed for sale + wallet balance.
defi-info-7: The reservation deposit will be deducted in advance according to the different price ranges of your NFT reservation. (Deposit from low to high: 5, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500 USDT).
defi-info-8: If the reservation is unsuccessful, the deposit will be returned to the account. If the booking is successful, the deposit can be deducted from the transaction amount. If the account balance is insufficient and the transaction fails, the deposit will be deducted. Please ensure that the account balance is sufficient.
defi-info-9: Each price range is limited to one booking per person per day.
defi-info-10: The higher the level, the more appointments and price ranges you can make, and the more profits you can get.

document-text-1: TreasureNFT is the world's first comprehensive NFT trading platform based on algorithmic trading. Through an innovative algorithmic trading model, using automatic algorithmic quotes, automatic maintenance of liquidity, pioneering the industry, unlikes the traditional NFT trading platform quote model, which is vulnerable to market sentiment interference, as well as irrational investment factors driven by NFT asset prices fluctuate significantly. Once the market heat drops, NFT assets will experience a lack of liquidity. TreasureNFT with an innovative algorithmic price trading model brings liquidity to each NFT asset.
document-title-2: The world's first encrypted NFT integrated marketplace-TreasureNFT
invitation-text-1: On the Account page, click ”Referral” to enter the Sharing Center.
invitation-text-2: Copy the referral code, invitation link, or click ”share” to share directly through social apps. As shown below:
invite-text-1: Click ”Explore” and select the corresponding NFT collection (eg: Young Lady)
invite-text-2: Feel free to choose your favorite NFTs, or buy NFTs by filtering price and time.
invite-text-3: Click ”Explore” and select the corresponding NFT collection (eg: Young Lady)
invite-text-4: After making an NFT reservation, click ”Collection” to view the reserved order information (today's reservation, listing, unlisted)
invite-li-3: Unlisted: NFT information that has been successfully purchased
invite-text-5: To sell NFT, click ”Unlisted” and select ”List to sell”.
invite-text-6: Click ”Listing” to view the order that is on sale
tips-li-3: Trading time: 19:00—19:30 -Publish the result of the Reservation at 19:00.

footer_intro1: TreasureNFT is a Web3 revenue platform based on NFT collections
index_intro1: Earning income in TreasureNFT is simple, just RESERVE, TRADE and EARN
index-h1-1: DISCOVER AND COLLECT DIGITAL ART NFTs
index-subtitle-1: Digital marketplace for crypto collectibles and non-fungible tokens(NFTs). Buy、sell and discover exclusive digital assets.
index-illustrate-text-1: Explore, Discover and earn here, top Web3 NFT OF THE WORLD
index-illustrate-text-3: TreasureNFT adopts an innovative algorithmic trading model, and introduces a dual integration mechanism of trading reward and referral reward.
index-illustrate-text-5: TreasureNFT reduces the entry threshold of the NFT market and expands the boundaries of the NFT market through a new algorithmic trading model and inclusive financial model.
Polygon-text-2: Once wrongly deposited, your NFT will not be retrieved.
entrance-text-2: Can’t open? (Clear the cache first) or switch to the telecommunications network to refresh and try again!

appointmentInstructions: Within a day, you can book NFT multiple times in different sessions to get more benefits.
account-check-modal-hint: Do you already have a TreasureNFT account?

okcText: To ensure better user experience, the NFT deposit function on OKC chain is currently in the batch testing stage. Only selected users can participate in this stage.
reserveCratesInfo: For every successfully reserved session, you can open a reservation treasure chest, which can only obtain one reward from the prize pool. Currently, there are two reservation sessions, and the treasure chest can be opened a maximum of two times per day.
upgradeChestText: Upgrade treasure box, users can open the corresponding level of treasure box when they reach each level, and each level can only be opened once.
upgradeChestInfoText: Every time you level up, you can get extra rewards and have a better chance of receiving high-value rewards. Please work hard to improve your level and get more rewards.
dailyRewardsInfoText: If you successfully reserve once during each time period, you can get a treasure box. You can only get one treasure box at most during each time period. There is a chance to get high-value rewards when opening the treasure box.
airdropModalText: Congratulations, you have received a treasure box. Please proceed to open it and receive your reward.
